page.title: 05OUR SCHOOL--------A.BUTCHER
page.content: OUR SCHOOL ISN'T VERY BIG IT HAS A PLAYGROUND AND TOILETS OUTSIDE.WE HAVE 84 CHILDREN IN THE SCHOOL,4 TEACHERS AND NINE MUMS HELP OUT. THE SCHOOL LOOKS LIKE A CHURCH FROM THE OUTSIDE AND A WALL AT THE FRONT OF THE SCHOOL AND A GATE.THE SCHOOL HAS BIG WINDOWS,ABOUT 4 IN EACH CLASSROOM. WE HAVE A LIBRARY AND A NEW ROOM.WE HAVE A PAINTING BENCH. THERE ARE THREE CLASSROOMS AND ALL ARE BIG.WE HAVE PEAK MATHS BOOKS AND PEAK ENGLISH BOOKS.WE ALSO HAVE A COMPUTER AND A PIANO.WE HAVE A LOT OF MATERIAL AND PAINT AND ALSO SOME COTTON. WE HAVE ABOUT 27 CHILDREN IN OUR CLASS.WE DO CRAFT ON WEDNESDAY AND SWIMMING ON TUESDAY.WE HAVE ASSEMBLY NEARLY EVERY DAY OF THE WEEK. OUR SCHOOL IS ABOUT 100 YEARS OLD.I HAVE BEEN AT THIS SCHOOL FOR 5 YEARS.
